episode.title: 90 Minutes or Bust
episode.rawTitle: 129: ‘90 Minutes or Bust’ With Guest Ben Thompson
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include: our top complaints about Apple Watch, Apple making a car, the New York Times's profile of Amazon's work culture, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include: our top complaints about Apple Watch, Apple making a car, the New York Times's profile of Amazon's work culture, and more.
